trans-unit.source: Provides a custom <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> to use for grouping properties that are displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> personalizado a ser usado para agrupar propriedades que são exibidas em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> instance that is checked to determine whether it is included among those properties edited by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> é verificada para determinar se ela está incluída entre essas propriedades editadas pelo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines which properties are edited by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina quais propriedades são editadas pelo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this editor edits the specified property; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se este editor edita a propriedade especificada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> for which to create a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> para o qual criar um novo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> type for which to create the new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> para o qual o novo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> será criado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" /> para o tipo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> that is hosted by the property inspector to provide the user interface for a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> que é hospedado pela inspeção de propriedade para fornecer a interface do usuário para um <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> user interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The desired <see cref="T.Systems.Windows.Size" /> of the image to return.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T.Systems.Windows.Size" /> desejado da imagem para retornar.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that the host can display in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que o host pode exibir em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> para exibir no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a localized string that indicates to which category the editor belongs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres localizada que indica à qual categoria o editor pertence.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the editor category.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa a categoria editor.

trans-unit.source: Category editors are defined on types and, thus, at load time they need to indicate to which category they belong.
trans-unit.target: Editores de categoria são definidos nos tipos e, assim, no tempo de carregamento é necessário indicar para qual categoria eles pertencem.
